bill.title: The Sunshine Law; Permitted Interactions; Public Notices
bill.description: Allows multiple board members to attend the same public gatherings and community events that are not related to any matter over which the board is currently exercising its authority and meets requirements for permitted interactions. Allows multiple members to attend the same conferences and seminars if the member produces a public report and meets requirements for permitted interactions. Allows notice of board meetings to be sent to persons requesting notice by e-mail. (HB1611 HD2)

history.action: (H) Referred to JUD, LMG, FIN, referral sheet 3
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 01-24-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Coffman, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Carroll.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 81-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to LMG.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on LMG with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Awana excused (1).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by LMG on Wednesday, 02-15-12 1:30PM in House conference room 423.

(H) The committees on LMG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Tokioka, Manahan, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from LMG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 584-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
(H) Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Herkes, M. Lee excused (2).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-24-12 4:30PM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Kawakami, Morikawa, Tokioka, Ward.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 855-12), recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
